argumentText:
ARGUMENT
c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcmon.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 2 |  | oppcmon.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 3 |  | oppcmon.m | |- M = ( Mono ` O ) |
| 4 |  | oppcmon.e | |- E = ( Epi ` C ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( c = C -> ( oppCat ` c ) = ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( c = C -> ( oppCat ` c ) = O ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( c = C -> ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) = ( Mono ` O ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( c = C -> ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) = M ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_tposeqd | |- ( c = C -> tpos ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) = tpos M ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-epi | |- Epi = ( c e. Cat |-> tpos ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Mono ` O ) e. _V |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_eqeltri | |- M e. _V |
| 13 | 12 | #P_tposex | |- tpos M e. _V |
| 14 | 9, 10, 13 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( Epi ` C ) = tpos M ) |
| 15 | 2, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Epi ` C ) = tpos M ) |
| 16 | 4, 15 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> E = tpos M ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( Y E X ) = ( Y tpos M X ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_ovtpos | |- ( Y tpos M X ) = ( X M Y ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl6req | |- ( ph -> ( X M Y ) = ( Y E X ) ) |
